review: I didn't know just how this product workout for me. I didn't know that you had to pay for moves on the fire stick. I thought that when you pay for the device the movies was included.
author: GARY  GEORGE

review: I love it! We have an HD TV that isn't a smart TV but with this we can have access to our Amazon prime and Netflix on that tv. Now we don't have to fight for the smart tv.
author: Kindle Customer

review: Beyond my expectations.  Absolutely love this device. I can move it from TV to TV and watch the shows that I love.  LOVE THE AMAZON FIRE STICK.
author: Karen R.

review: Love this thing!!!! Easy set up. Connected quickly to my router. Great picture quality. Awesome!
author: Armando Gonzalez

review: I am amazon prime subscriber so I wanted to try the fire after moving out of a place that had apple TV hooked up.  I have decided to go back to the Apple TV because it just performs better, plus apple TV's selection of apps are better.
author: Zachary Thormann

review: Enjoy my music, pictures, videos, games n movies in 1 device to share with the whole family.  It's easy to use.
author: danq

review: We are enjoying the convenience of the Fire Stick. I should have gotten one sooner. Thanks for this outstanding product.
author: Robert Robinson

review: Works great! No issues. The system has been a pleasant surprise in speed and quality.
author: adam sellers
